text:
Message 2258 of 4024
Also... Nanna has obviously been asking to see the boys since long before your girls trip to New York. Remember, we were going to try and time it so
you were out of town, but you killed that. And of course we see The Moyers every year. Both Michael and Robyn and Beth are regular visits. We
always go visit our extended family.
So given that you took the boys to go visit your whole family and then made a decision to divorce me after talking to your mom, when do the boys get
to see my side of the family? Obviously, if it requires you, that’s fine. I took your whole family to Whistler and had an amazing time. It works great!
Given we both are really trying to work hard to make sure the boys have the best and most supportive family experience, but they have been utterly
cut off from my family while I’ve enabled yours, please build that into the parenting plan.
Thanks again!!!
Sent:03/21/2024 at 07:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/21/2024 at 09:04 PM)
Subject:Re: Still No Word
Message 2259 of 4024
I’ll have my lawyer request.
Sent:03/21/2024 at 09:04 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/21/2024 at 09:33 PM)
Subject:Re: Names of 5 therapists
Message 2260 of 4024
I’m puzzled by this.
Is the implication I cut them off?
Have they been made aware of your situation, and your relationship with Max and Adrian?
I can reach out directly to them.
